doc:
George Berrell https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Berrell 0 George Berrell (December 16, 1849 – April 20, 1933) was an American actor of both the 19th and early 20th century stage and of the silent film era. He appeared in numerous stage plays as well as 55 films over the course of a career that ran from 1850 to 1927. He was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania and died in Los Angeles, California. George_Berrell ( December_16_,_1849 – April_20_,_1933 ) was an_American_actor of both the_19th_and_early_20th_century_stage and of the_silent_film_era . He appeared in numerous_stage plays as_well as 55_films over the_course of a_career that ran from 1850 to 1927 . He was_born in Philadelphia , Pennsylvania and died in Los_Angeles , California .
